verses.verse: וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> on הַחֲתוּמִ֑ים <WH2856> Now those that sealed נְחֶמְיָ֧ה <WH5166> [were] Nehemiah הַתִּרְשָׁ֛תָא <WH8660> the Tirshatha בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חֲכַלְיָ֖ה <WH2446> of Hachaliah וְצִדְקִיָּֽה׃ <WH6667> and Zidkijah
שְׂרָיָ֥ה <WH8304> Seraiah עֲזַרְיָ֖ה <WH5838> Azariah יִרְמְיָֽה׃ <WH3414> Jeremiah
פַּשְׁח֥וּר <WH6583> Pashur אֲמַרְיָ֖ה <WH568> Amariah מַלְכִּיָּֽה׃ <WH4441> Malchijah
חַטּ֥וּשׁ <WH2407> Hattush שְׁבַנְיָ֖ה <WH7645> Shebaniah מַלּֽוּךְ׃ <WH4409> Malluch
חָרִ֥ם <WH2766> Harim מְרֵמ֖וֹת <WH4822> Meremoth עֹֽבַדְיָֽה׃ <WH5662> Obadiah
דָּנִיֵּ֥אל <WH1840> Daniel גִּנְּת֖וֹן <WH1599> Ginnethon בָּרֽוּךְ׃ <WH1263> Baruch
מְשֻׁלָּ֥ם <WH4918> Meshullam אֲבִיָּ֖ה <WH29> Abijah מִיָּמִֽן׃ <WH4326> Mijamin
מַֽעַזְיָ֥ה <WH4590> Maaziah בִלְגַּ֖י <WH1084> Bilgai שְׁמַֽעְיָ֑ה <WH8098> Shemaiah אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> These הַכֹּהֲנִֽים׃ <WH3548> these [were] the priests ס

וְֽהַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> And the Levites וְיֵשׁ֙וּעַ֙ <WH3442> both Jeshua בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲזַנְיָ֔ה <WH245> of Azaniah בִּנּ֕וּי <WH1131> Binnui מִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the sons חֵנָדָ֖ד <WH2582> of Henadad קַדְמִיאֵֽל׃ <WH6934> Kadmiel
וַאֲחֵיהֶ֑ם <WH251> And their brethren שְׁבַנְיָ֧ה <WH7645> Shebaniah הֽוֹדִיָּ֛ה <WH1940> Hodiah קְלִיטָ֖א <WH7042> Kelita פְּלָאיָ֥ה <WH6411> Pelaiah חָנָֽן׃ <WH2605> Hanan
מִיכָ֥א <WH4316> Micha רְח֖וֹב <WH7340> Rehob חֲשַׁבְיָֽה׃ <WH2811> Hashabiah
זַכּ֥וּר <WH2139> Zaccur שֵׁרֵֽבְיָ֖ה <WH8274> Sherebiah שְׁבַנְיָֽה׃ <WH7645> Shebaniah
הוֹדִיָּ֥ה <WH1940> Hodiah בָנִ֖י <WH1137> Bani בְּנִֽינוּ׃ <WH1148> Beninu ס
רָאשֵׁ֖י <WH7218> The chief הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> of the people פַּרְעֹשׁ֙ <WH6551> Parosh פַּחַ֣ת מוֹאָ֔ב <WH6355> Pahathmoab עֵילָ֥ם <WH5867> Elam זַתּ֖וּא <WH2240> Zatthu בָּנִֽי׃ <WH1137> Bani
בֻּנִּ֥י <WH1138> Bunni עַזְגָּ֖ד <WH5803> Azgad בֵּבָֽי׃ <WH893> Bebai
אֲדֹנִיָּ֥ה <WH138> Adonijah בִגְוַ֖י <WH902> Bigvai עָדִֽין׃ <WH5720> Adin
אָטֵ֥ר <WH333> Ater חִזְקִיָּ֖ה <WH2396> Hizkijah עַזּֽוּר׃ <WH5809> Azzur
הוֹדִיָּ֥ה <WH1940> Hodiah חָשֻׁ֖ם <WH2828> Hashum בֵּצָֽי׃ <WH1209> Bezai
חָרִ֥יף <WH2756> Hariph עֲנָת֖וֹת <WH6068> Anathoth [נֹובָי כ] (נֵיבָֽי׃ <WH5109> Nebai ק)
מַגְפִּיעָ֥שׁ <WH4047> Magpiash מְשֻׁלָּ֖ם <WH4918> Meshullam חֵזִֽיר׃ <WH2387> Hezir
מְשֵׁיזַבְאֵ֥ל <WH4898> Meshezabeel צָד֖וֹק <WH6659> Zadok יַדּֽוּעַ׃ <WH3037> Jaddua
פְּלַטְיָ֥ה <WH6410> Pelatiah חָנָ֖ן <WH2605> Hanan עֲנָיָֽה׃ <WH6043> Anaiah
הוֹשֵׁ֥עַ <WH1954> Hoshea חֲנַנְיָ֖ה <WH2608> Hananiah חַשּֽׁוּב׃ <WH2815> Hashub
הַלּוֹחֵ֥שׁ <WH3873> Hallohesh פִּלְחָ֖א <WH6401> Pileha שׁוֹבֵֽק׃ <WH7733> Shobek
רְח֥וּם <WH7348> Rehum חֲשַׁבְנָ֖ה <WH2812> Hashabnah מַעֲשֵׂיָֽה׃ <WH4641> Maaseiah
וַאֲחִיָּ֥ה <WH281> And Ahijah חָנָ֖ן <WH2605> Hanan עָנָֽן׃ <WH6052> Anan
מַלּ֥וּךְ <WH4409> Malluch חָרִ֖ם <WH2766> Harim בַּעֲנָֽה׃ <WH1196> Baanah

וּשְׁאָ֣ר <WH7605> And the rest הָעָ֡ם <WH5971> of the people הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <WH3548> the priests הַ֠לְוִיִּם <WH3881> the Levites הַשּׁוֹעֲרִ֨ים <WH7778> the porters הַמְשֹׁרְרִ֜ים <WH7891> the singers הַנְּתִינִ֗ים <WH5411> the Nethinims וְֽכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַנִּבְדָּ֞ל <WH914> and all they that had separated מֵעַמֵּ֤י <WH5971> themselves from the people הָאֲרָצוֹת֙ <WH776> of the lands אֶל־ <WH413> to תּוֹרַ֣ת <WH8451> unto the law הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God נְשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <WH802> their wives בְּנֵיהֶ֣ם <WH1121> their sons וּבְנֹתֵיהֶ֑ם <WH1323> and their daughters כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all יוֹדֵ֥עַ <WH3045> every one having knowledge מֵבִֽין׃ <WH995> and having understanding

מַחֲזִיקִ֣ים <WH2388> They clave עַל־ <WH5921> with אֲחֵיהֶם֮ <WH251> to their brethren אַדִּירֵיהֶם֒ <WH117> their nobles וּבָאִ֞ים <WH935> and entered בְּאָלָ֣ה <WH423> into a curse וּבִשְׁבוּעָ֗ה <WH7621> and into an oath לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <WH1980> to walk בְּתוֹרַ֣ת <WH8451> law הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> in God's אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which נִתְּנָ֔ה <WH5414> which was given בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> by מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <WH5650> the servant הָֽאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God וְלִשְׁמ֣וֹר <WH8104> and to observe וְלַעֲשׂ֗וֹת <WH6213> and do אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מִצְוֹת֙ <WH4687> all the commandments יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲדֹנֵ֔ינוּ <WH136> our Lord וּמִשְׁפָּטָ֖יו <WH4941> and his judgments וְחֻקָּֽיו׃ <WH2706> and his statutes

וַאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after לֹא־ <WH3808> we will not נִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> And that we would not give בְּנֹתֵ֖ינוּ <WH1323> our daughters לְעַמֵּ֣י <WH5971> unto the people הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the land וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֹ֣תֵיהֶ֔ם <WH1323> their daughters לֹ֥א <WH3808> or נִקַּ֖ח <WH3947> nor take לְבָנֵֽינוּ׃ <WH1121> for our sons

וְעַמֵּ֣י <WH5971> And [if] the people הָאָ֡רֶץ <WH776> of the land הַֽמְבִיאִים֩ <WH935> bring אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּקָּח֨וֹת <WH4728> ware וְכָל־ <WH3605> any שֶׁ֜בֶר <WH7668> or any victuals בְּי֤וֹם <WH3117> day הַשַּׁבָּת֙ <WH7676> on the sabbath לִמְכּ֔וֹר <WH4376> to sell לֹא־ <WH3808> we will not נִקַּ֥ח <WH3947> [that] we would not buy מֵהֶ֛ם <WH1992> like בַּשַּׁבָּ֖ת <WH7676> it of them on the sabbath וּבְי֣וֹם <WH3117> day קֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> or on the holy וְנִטֹּ֛שׁ <WH5203> and [that] we would leave אֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׁנָ֥ה <WH8141> year הַשְּׁבִיעִ֖ית <WH7637> the seventh וּמַשָּׁ֥א <WH4855> and the exaction כָל־ <WH3605> of every יָֽד׃ <WH3027> of every debt

וְהֶעֱמַ֤דְנוּ <WH5975> Also we made עָלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH5921> under מִצְוֹ֔ת <WH4687> ordinances לָתֵ֥ת <WH5414> for us to charge עָלֵ֛ינוּ <WH5921> under שְׁלִשִׁ֥ית <WH7992> with the third part הַשֶּׁ֖קֶל <WH8255> of a shekel בַּשָּׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> ourselves yearly לַעֲבֹדַ֖ת <WH5656> for the service בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> of the house אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> of our God

לְלֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> bread הַֽמַּעֲרֶ֡כֶת <WH4635> row וּמִנְחַ֣ת <WH4503> meat offering הַתָּמִ֣יד <WH8548> and for the continual וּלְעוֹלַ֣ת <WH5930> burnt offering הַ֠תָּמִיד <WH8548> and for the continual הַשַּׁבָּת֨וֹת <WH7676> of the sabbaths הֶחֳדָשִׁ֜ים <WH2320> of the new moons לַמּוֹעֲדִ֗ים <WH4150> for the set feasts וְלַקֳּדָשִׁים֙ <WH6944> and for the holy וְלַ֣חַטָּא֔וֹת <WH2403> [things] and for the sin offerings לְכַפֵּ֖ר <WH3722> to make an atonement עַל־ <WH5921> for יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> for Israel וְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> and all מְלֶ֥אכֶת <WH4399> and [for] all the work בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> of our God ס

וְהַגּוֹרָל֨וֹת <WH1486> the lots הִפַּ֜לְנוּ <WH5307> And we cast עַל־ <WH5921> for קֻרְבַּ֣ן <WH7133> offering הָעֵצִ֗ים <WH6086> for the wood הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <WH3548> among the priests הַלְוִיִּם֮ <WH3881> the Levites וְהָעָם֒ <WH5971> and the people לְ֠הָבִיא <WH935> to bring לְבֵ֨ית <WH1004> [it] into the house אֱלֹהֵ֧ינוּ <WH430> of our God לְבֵית־ <WH1004> after the houses אֲבֹתֵ֛ינוּ <WH1> of our fathers לְעִתִּ֥ים <WH6256> at times מְזֻמָּנִ֖ים <WH2163> appointed שָׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> year בְשָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> by year לְבַעֵ֗ר <WH1197> to burn עַל־ <WH5921> on מִזְבַּח֙ <WH4196> upon the altar יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> our God כַּכָּת֖וּב <WH3789> as [it is] written בַּתּוֹרָֽה׃ <WH8451> in the law

וּלְהָבִ֞יא <WH935> And to bring אֶת־ <WH853> בִּכּוּרֵ֣י <WH1061> the firstfruits אַדְמָתֵ֗נוּ <WH127> of our ground וּבִכּוּרֵ֛י <WH1061> and the firstfruits כָּל־ <WH3605> of all פְּרִ֥י <WH6529> of all fruit כָל־ <WH3605> of every עֵ֖ץ <WH6086> of all trees שָׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> year בְשָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> by year לְבֵ֖ית <WH1004> unto the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּכֹר֤וֹת <WH1060> Also the firstborn בָּנֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH1121> of our sons וּבְהֶמְתֵּ֔ינוּ <WH929> and of our cattle כַּכָּת֖וּב <WH3789> as [it is] written בַּתּוֹרָ֑ה <WH8451> in the law וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּכוֹרֵ֨י <WH1060> and the firstborn בְקָרֵ֜ינוּ <WH1241> of our herds וְצֹאנֵ֗ינוּ <WH6629> and of our flocks לְהָבִיא֙ <WH935> to bring לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> to the house אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> of our God לַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> unto the priests הַמְשָׁרְתִ֖ים <WH8334> that minister בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> in the house אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> of our God

וְאֶת־ <WH853> רֵאשִׁ֣ית <WH7225> the firstfruits עֲרִיסֹתֵ֣ינוּ <WH6182> of our dough וּ֠תְרוּמֹתֵינוּ <WH8641> and our offerings וּפְרִ֨י <WH6529> and the fruit כָל־ <WH3605> of every עֵ֜ץ <WH6086> of all manner of trees תִּיר֣וֹשׁ <WH8492> of wine וְיִצְהָ֗ר <WH3323> and of oil נָבִ֤יא <WH935> And [that] we should bring לַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> unto the priests אֶל־ <WH413> at לִשְׁכ֣וֹת <WH3957> to the chambers בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> of our God וּמַעְשַׂ֥ר <WH4643> and the tithes אַדְמָתֵ֖נוּ <WH127> of our ground לַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> unto the Levites וְהֵם֙ <WH1992> for הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> that the same Levites הַֽמְעַשְּׂרִ֔ים <WH6237> might have the tithes בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all עָרֵ֥י <WH5892> in all the cities עֲבֹדָתֵֽנוּ׃ <WH5656> of our tillage

וְהָיָ֨ה <WH1961> become הַכֹּהֵ֧ן <WH3548> And the priest בֶּֽן־ <WH1121> the son אַהֲרֹ֛ן <WH175> of Aaron עִם־ <WH5973> shall be with הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <WH3881> shall be with the Levites בַּעְשֵׂ֣ר <WH6237> take tithes הַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> when the Levites וְהַלְוִיִּ֞ם <WH3881> and the Levites יַעֲל֨וּ <WH5927> shall bring up אֶת־ <WH853> מַעֲשַׂ֤ר <WH4643> the tithe הַֽמַּעֲשֵׂר֙ <WH4643> of the tithes לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> unto the house אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> of our God אֶל־ <WH413> to הַלְּשָׁכ֖וֹת <WH3957> to the chambers לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> house הָאוֹצָֽר׃ <WH214> into the treasure

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אֶל־ <WH413> to הַ֠לְּשָׁכוֹת <WH3957> unto the chambers יָבִ֨יאוּ <WH935> shall bring בְנֵי־ <WH1121> For the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> and the children הַלֵּוִ֗י <WH3878> of Levi אֶת־ <WH853> תְּרוּמַ֣ת <WH8641> the offering הַדָּגָן֮ <WH1715> of the corn הַתִּיר֣וֹשׁ <WH8492> of the new wine וְהַיִּצְהָר֒ <WH3323> and the oil וְשָׁם֙ <WH8033> there כְּלֵ֣י <WH3627> where [are] the vessels הַמִּקְדָּ֔שׁ <WH4720> of the sanctuary וְהַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> and the priests הַמְשָׁ֣רְתִ֔ים <WH8334> that minister וְהַשּׁוֹעֲרִ֖ים <WH7778> and the porters וְהַמְשֹׁרְרִ֑ים <WH7891> and the singers וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> we will not נַעֲזֹ֖ב <WH5800> and we will not forsake אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> the house אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> of our God
